content: learn how to create lucy the bunny amigurumi with this free bunny crochet pattern this is an easy no sew crochet pattern perfect for beginners it is also very quick to make takes about 1 to 2 hours you can use any yarn to make it i made a small keychain mini bunny from sport weight cotton yarn and a bigger unicorn from chenille super bulky plush yarn the pattern has a full video tutorial included on how to make this cute bunny amigurumi link to written pattern https //www mariskavos nl/free-mini-bunny-crochet-pattern/ link to video https //youtu be/bs7mdeebdwc
